description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Warp Shooter is the first 3-vector dual stick shooter, as one of your hands is always in control of a warp beacon that allows you to jump through space! Shoot lasers, warp, and use a vast array power ups to destroy your opponents. Customize your own game modes and master the creative new mechanics in this all out multiplayer brawl!
description.short: Warp Shooter is the first 3-vector dual stick shooter, as one of your hands is always in control of a warp beacon that allows you to jump through space!
